import React from "react"; const Filters = ({ setFilter, handleSearch }) => { const handleFilter = (filter) => { setFilter(filter); }; return (
handleSearch(e.target.value)} className="border border-gray-700 rounded-lg w-[75%] lg:w-[50%] xl:w-[30%]" placeholder="Search our posts" />
{/* filter buttons */}
); }; export default Filters;
